long_description: Sized to fit smaller hands, the Arc'teryx C40 chalk bag will keep you climbing with a sure grip. Blend of tough nylon fabrics endures regular encounters with rock; polyester fleece-lined interior helps contain chalk. Loop on side stows a brush for cleaning holds, brush sold separately. Integrated bottle opener helps you unwind after a hard day of climbing. Drawstring with cordlock closes chalk bag when not in use. Arc'teryx C40 chalk bag includes a nylon webbing belt; chalk sold separately.
short_description: Sized to fit smaller hands, the Arc'teryx C40 chalk bag will keep you climbing with a sure grip.
